title: What to watch for as the Bruins and the Celtics start their seasons
dc:creator: WBUR
description: With the Bruins and the Celtics both starting their seasons, and a potential quarterback controversy brewing in Foxborough, we check in on the major Boston sports teams in our weekly Boston sports roundup.
